title: Seals, Sea Lions, and Walruses
description: In this fascinating and engaging book, students will learn the distinguishing characteristics of seals, sea lions, and walruses. They will also read about the habitats, food sources, and threats to this appealing group of animals called pinnipeds.
highFrequencyWords: blubber, haul out, marine, migrate, molt, pinnipeds, predators, prey
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ea and ee
phonics: Content Vocabulary                : Identify and use content vocabulary
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
